title: Client Onboarding - Final Documentation Review
description: Before handing a new client over to the service desk, the onboarding team conducts a final review of all documentation.

tasks.description: Review all configurations in the central documentation system for completeness and accuracy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team reviews network diagrams, credentials, procedures, and contact lists.

tasks.description: Identify any missing information and work to get it before the handover.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team finds that the ISP account number is missing and obtains it from the client.

tasks.description: Formally sign off on the onboarding, making the client 'live' for the service desk.
